title: How to unsubscribe from Legimi
description: Legimi is a Polish ebook and audiobook subscription service. You can cancel your Legimi subscription at any time through their website, app, or mobile operator (if applicable).

web.title: Cancel Legimi Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Legimi subscription through the website:

*   Go to the Legimi website.
*   Log in to your Legimi account.
*   Navigate to your account settings.
*   Find the 'Subscription' or 'Billing' section.
*   Click on 'Cancel Subscription' or a similar option.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Check for a confirmation email or message from Legimi.

app.title: Cancel Legimi Subscription via App
app.description:
To cancel your Legimi subscription through the app:

*   Open the Legimi app.
*   Log in to your Legimi account.
*   Navigate to your account settings.
*   Find the 'Subscription' or 'Billing' section.
*   Click on 'Cancel Subscription' or a similar option.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Check for a confirmation email or message from Legimi.

sms.title: Cancel Legimi Subscription via SMS
sms.description:
To cancel your Legimi subscription via SMS:

*   If subscribed via a mobile operator (Play or T-Mobile), send the appropriate cancellation SMS (e.g., STOP to 220 for Play ebooks).
